context_bundle.summary: Image automation automatically updates container image tags in Git repositories based on new registry versions

onboarding.quick_start: flux create image update my-app --image=my-app --tag-semver=~1.0 --git-branch=main && flux reconcile image update my-app
common_patterns: Image update controller: 'flux create image update --image=my-image --git-branch=main --interval=5m'
Tag filtering: '--tag-semver=~1.0' or '--tag-regex=^1\.\d+\.\d+$' for version matching
Push automation: '--git-push=secret' and configure git credentials for automated commits
Scan intervals: '--interval=5m' for frequent scanning or '--interval=1h' for resource efficiency
Multiple repositories: 'flux create image repository --image=registry.com/repo/image' for custom registries
known_errors: Scan failed: 'flux get image repositories' and check repository connectivity and authentication
Commit rejected: 'git push --dry-run' and verify branch protection rules and permissions
No new versions: 'flux get image update' and verify registry access and tag filtering rules
Authentication error: 'kubectl create secret docker-registry regcred --docker-server=registry.com' for registry access
Merge conflicts: 'flux reconcile image update --force' to overwrite conflicting changes
